title: Calories in 1 Teaspoon of Sugar
meta_description: Discover 1 teaspoon of sugar in calories, plus carbs, sugars, and other nutrients on a per-teaspoon basis with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Granulated white table sugar, level teaspoon (approximately 4 g).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, packing density, and measurement accuracy. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of granulated sugar contains about 16 kcal, all from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 teaspoon of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 16 kcal for one level teaspoon of granulated sugar.
Yes, 1 teaspoon is 4 g of carbohydrates, all as sugars, with no protein or fat.

faqs.q: What's the difference between white and brown sugar calories?
faqs.a: Similar at ~16-18 kcal per teaspoon; brown may have trace fiber and molasses.

faqs.q: How does sugar affect daily intake?
